name: O! STRELALKA!!!
description:
Near space, the future, 2020. Sudden attack of aliens destroyed the house, everywhere malicious enemy ships, you jump into your combat spaceship and ahead to destroy the invaders. Your task is to destroy all ships and be saved. On the way to victory, you expect a variety of enemies. Everything will depend on your skill and experience! Decide quickly, prove your superiority! Stars like brave men!

Features:
★ Multiple levels, one of which is non-stop
★ Can kill time
★ Several kinds of opponents
★ Endless journey
★ Lots of fun and death
★ Minimum, affordable price

Wish happiness! And success!
